name: Klatskin's tumor
definition: An intrahepatic cholangiocarcinoma arising near or at the confluence of the right and left hepatic ducts. [url:https\://meshb.nlm.nih.gov/record/ui?ui=D018285]

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a pilot clinical trial, Rapamune (sirolimus) demonstrated modest clinical activity in patients with PIK3CA-mutant gastric cancer (n=3) or hilar cholangiocarcinoma (n=1; harboring PIK3CA E545K), with a 0% response rate, median progression-free survival of 1.9 months, and median overall survival of 3.6 months (PMID: 28685070).

references.title: Pilot study of sirolimus in patients with PIK3CA mutant/amplified refractory solid cancer.
